@Kingashi- I am not using any tweaks. Not sure what you mean by ENB series. I downloaded PMDG NGX B700-800-900 series. It had a update which was labeled PMDG Update 737-800  6700 SP1c update and the 737-900 8900 Sp1c Update. Then it had a PMDG_737NGX.dll file for the crack. After I followed the install instruction, it loaded up the first time with grey gauges and then it crashed and crashed every time since then. I did uninstall it because it obviously giving me issue. I see now the NGX in your title as it was labeled that. Unless there is a better copy of the plane itself might help.

@ maddog7777

I have the same setup like yours and i works like charm...try searching avsim threads...and also try to set the textures in low in performance manager....you'll find it in the pmdg ngx folder in FSX directory..
